description:
Descended from the beloved Rad pants, the Micas are the ones for rock, rivers and trails. Durable fabric stands up to scratchy underbrush or grainy quartzite. The elastic waist does away with unnecessary zippers or buttons, and sits nicely under a harness. A hit of stretch provides excellent movement and ease.Made of durable ripstop nylon and spandex, with recycled content.Durable water repellent (DWR) finish provides weather protection against unexpected showers.Gusseted crotch and articulated knees allow full movement.Elastic waist with faux fly.Waist drawcord is reversible so it can face out or hide inside.Jean-style front pockets, 1 side pocket and 1 back pocket.Straight legs are slim fitting.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
